item.title: Servlets and JSP
item.description: Today I decided to study about Servlets and JSP a little bit and I will talk a little bit about them. Servlets What are servlets? A servlet is a Java class that extends the HttpServlet class. It is used to handle HTTP requests and responses. When are servlets used? Theyb are used to create dynamic web pages and applications. Dynamic web pages are web pages that are generated by the server.
